document_data.name: Werestag
document_data.mainbody: A '''werestag''' was a type of [[lycanthrope]] that could take the form of a [[stag]] or a stag-like hybrid.
document_data.Description: Werestags were able to take different forms. The first was the animal-form, where the lycanthrope could transform into a stag. The other form was the hybrid form, where the lycanthrope would appear as a shaggy [[humanoid]] with the head of a stag.
document_data.Notable werestags:
* [[Yimluth]], a powerful [[archmage]] who was believed to have attained near-immortality.
* [[Bhyrindaar Tellynnan]], a [[moon elf]] who went by the name Silverhart after contracting lycanthropy from a [[human]] he slew.
